translation.en: Your time. Right, let's have it, boys, yeah?
We're here in London for the final stop of the Stereo Dream world tour.
translation.es: Estamos en Londres para la última parada de la gira mundial de Stereo Dream.

translation.en: The fans cannot get enough of those five boys,
translation.es: Los fanáticos no se cansan de esos cinco chicos,

translation.en: led by the edgy, the mysterious Vinnie D and the boy-next-door, Austin.
translation.es: liderado por el misterioso Vinnie D y el chico bueno Austin.

translation.en: Come on then, boys. Energy, yeah? Energy! Let's go!
You do live music here, yeah?

translation.es: - De vez en cuando, sí. - Escucha.
- Qué bien, ¿la escribiste tú o…? - Sí.

translation.en: It's not finished yet, but you get the vibe.
translation.es: Aún no está terminada, pero entiendes la vibra.

translation.en: -Um… -[Vinnie] I could play it live for you.
Yeah, I think we're good for now, but, um…
translation.es: Sí, creo que estamos bien por ahora, pero…

translation.en: How does anything get picked up if you don't wanna listen?
translation.es: ¿Cómo eligen algo si no lo escuchan?

translation.en: -[Vinnie] It's a demo. It's a bit rough. -Yeah. No, no, I can hear that. Um…
translation.es: - Es solo una demo. Le falta pulir. - Sí, no, se nota.

translation.en: -[Vinnie] But you get the idea? -I absolutely do.
-Um. Yeah. -[Vinnie] Yeah, what do you think?
It's gonna be a no from us.
It's cyclical, you know? The music scene.
So it's just… wait for it to circle back around.
translation.es: Espera a que dé la vuelta de nuevo.

translation.en: -[Vinnie] A couple of weeks? -Uh, bigger circles.
translation.es: ¿Un par de semanas? Vueltas más grandes.

translation.en: ♪ Down in your bones ♪ ♪ Do you toss and turn… ♪
translation.es: TAKE A BOW GIRA DE DESPEDIDA DE AUSTIN ROBERTS

translation.en: [man] Look, the only way you'll ever end up on our radar
translation.es: La única forma en que te pongamos atención

translation.en: is if you have complete songs and the numbers to back it up.
translation.es: es con canciones completas y números de respaldo.

translation.en: [man] Like a few hundred thousand followers on Instagram or TikTok.
translation.es: Unos cientos de miles de seguidores en Instagram o Tik-Tok.

translation.en: Hey, check this out. It's not finished yet, but you get the vibe.
translation.es: Mira esto. No está terminado, pero entiendes la vibra.

translation.en: I get that, but it's not our thing.
translation.es: Entiendo, pero no es lo nuestro.

translation.en: Vinnie D! How far the mighty have fallen!
Now look at ya. Busking off Rye Lane.
translation.es: Ahora mírate. Tocando en las calles.

translation.en: No, I'm not busking… I'm practicing.
translation.es: No, no estoy tocando. Estoy practicando.

translation.en: Oh, go on then, be like that then. Prick.
Well, your hair looks shit anyway. You should go back to your blond boy-band look.
translation.es: Tienes el cabello horrible. Vuelve al rubio de la banda de chicos.

translation.en: Pound a bowl! Pound a bowl!
Get your tomatoes, fresh tomatoes. And your peppers!
translation.es: Lleven sus tomates frescos. ¡Y sus pimientos!

translation.en: -[music stops] -Yo… My bro, I'm trying to practice, man.
Yo, keep it in time, man.
Where did you go? I was looking for you.
I'm sorry. I didn't mean to shout, but, please, I was looking for you for ages.
translation.es: Perdón por gritar, pero te busqué por mucho tiempo.

translation.en: I'm sorry. Come on. Let's go.

translation.es: - Oye, ¡eso estuvo genial! - No debería estar aquí solo.

translation.en: Listen, he shouldn't be out here on his own. I'm sorry if he disturbed you.
translation.es: - Oye, ¡eso estuvo genial! - No debería estar aquí solo. Lamento si te molestó.

translation.en: He didn't disturb me. But that was awesome.
translation.es: No me molestó. Pero eso estuvo increíble.

translation.en: I was walking up and down the street. I couldn't find you. I was panicking.
translation.es: Caminé por todos lados y no te encontraba, entré en pánico.

translation.en: [presenter] …some amazing things up in the Lake District, didn't he?
translation.es: …cosas increíbles en el distrito de los lagos, ¿no?

translation.en: We'll find out more about that on Sunday night.
translation.es: Sabremos más de eso el domingo.

translation.en: [presenter 2] Now, we are delighted to welcome to the studio,
translation.es: Ahora, estamos encantados de darle la bienvenida al estudio al gran Austin Roberts.
de darle la bienvenida al estudio al gran Austin Roberts.

translation.en: -[presenter 2] It's great to see you. -[Austin] Thanks for having me.
translation.es: - Qué bueno verte. - Gracias por invitarme.

translation.en: [presenter 2] So this is it. You're releasing your final album after an extraordinary career.
translation.es: Esto es todo, lanzarás tu último álbum después de una carrera extraordinaria.

translation.en: And of course you have the farewell tour coming up too.
translation.es: Y también viene la gira de despedida.

translation.en: Yeah, yeah, it's been a long ride. I guess I've been very blessed.
translation.es: Sí, ha sido un viaje largo. Supongo que he sido bendecido.

translation.en: [presenter] The fans are going to be very gutted that it's the last one.
translation.es: Los fanes estarán muy destrozados porque es la última.

translation.en: How do you feel about that? Are you gonna miss performing?
[Austin] The fans have been good to me over the years. Music has been my life, and it's given me everything.
translation.es: Sí, los fanes siempre me han tratado bien, la música es mi vida y me ha dado todo.

translation.en: [presenter] Yes, from your days with Stereo Dream to your amazing solo career.
translation.es: Sí, desde tus días con Stereo Dream hasta tu increíble carrera como solista.

translation.en: Now that you're winding down, Austin, do you have any regrets?
translation.es: Ahora que estás terminando, Austin, ¿te arrepientes de algo?

translation.en: I definitely regret those shocking hairstyles we had in Stereo Dream.
translation.es: Sí que me arrepiento de esos peinados que teníamos en Stereo Dream.

translation.en: [presenter] Thank you so much for joining us…
Hiya. What can I get you?
Yeah, please. Can I have a, um… cider, please?
translation.es: Sí, por favor. ¿Me das una sidra, por favor?

translation.en: D'you know, just… a half-pint will be all right, you know?
I, um… saw you've got a new live music night starting up and…
translation.es: Vi que empezarán a tocar música en vivo y…

translation.en: Not everyone gets to perform at Peckham's Finest.
Yeah. I mean for me it's not really about getting to perform.
translation.es: Sí. Quiero decir, para mí no se trata de presentarme.

translation.en: You probably don't recognize me, but…
-I used to be… -Vinnie D. Stereo Dream.
Anyway, I'm finally working on my solo album.
translation.es: Al fin estoy trabajando en mi álbum como solista.

translation.en: But, yeah, I just need a couple cozy, intimate venues like this
translation.es: Pero necesito algunos lugares íntimos y acogedores como este

translation.en: to perform at before I go on tour.
translation.es: para tocar antes de salir de gira.

translation.en: Look, Big Dave, he chooses who plays and… he's quite picky, so…
translation.es: Mira, Big Dave elige quién toca y es muy quisquilloso, así que…

translation.en: I… I think you made a mistake.
-I just wanted a… -It's on the house, Vinnie D.
translation.es: - Solo quería… - Es gratis. Vinnie D.

translation.en: Vinnie D. He used to be the lead singer of Stereo Dream.
translation.es: Vinnie D era el vocalista de Stereo Dream,

translation.en: A boy band from 20 years ago. Anyway, look…
translation.es: una banda de chicos de hace 20 años.

translation.en: He's got material for his solo album, which he wants to showcase here.
translation.es: Tiene material para su álbum solista que quiere mostrar aquí.

translation.en: [bartender] He'll bring in a whole bunch of new punters.
Hi, Vinnie. Um, it's Mum. I know it's been a while.
translation.es: Hola, Vinnie. Es mamá. Sé que ha pasado mucho tiempo.

translation.en: [sighs] It's Ted's birthday next week. Um…
translation.es: La próxima semana es el cumpleaños de Ted.

translation.en: And I'll be going to see him and I thought you might want to come.
translation.es: Iré a verlo y pensé que querrías ir.

translation.en: Are you here for the, uh…?
-I think I'm lost, you know. -And now you are found. Come.
translation.es: Creo que me perdí. Y ahora te encontraron. Ven con nosotros.
Y ahora te encontraron. Ven con nosotros.

translation.en: Oh, he can have my own.
Sit here, my friend. You are welcome.
We play the heartbeat again… My brother, what is your name?
translation.es: Volvemos a tocar el latido… Mi hermano, ¿cómo te llamas?

translation.en: [Dia] We go again, and this time,
translation.es: Vamos de nuevo y, esta vez,

translation.en: I want Vince to be the heartbeat.
translation.es: Vince será el latido del corazón.

translation.en: Everyone, I want you to breathe together.
You will feel it soon, my friend.
Boom goes the fire and the morning sun.
translation.es: Bum hace el fuego y el sol de la mañana.

translation.en: My brother, take off your jewelry.
♪ Achong ma ne chung, hey ♪ ♪ Achong ma ne chung ♪ ♪ Achong ma ne chung, hey ♪
♪ Achong ma ne chung ♪ ♪ Achong ma ne chung ♪ ♪ Achong ma ne ♪
-♪ Achong ma ne chung ♪ -Welcome the day! -♪ Achong ma ne chung ♪ -Welcome the day! -♪ Achong ma ne chung ♪ -My brother!
translation.es: - Achong ma ne chung. - ¡Bienvenido hoy! ¡Mi hermano!

translation.en: -♪ Achong ma ne chung ♪ -Yes, sir. -♪ Achong ma ne chung ♪ -Let's go!
translation.es: - Achong ma ne chung. - Sí, señor. ¡Vamos!

translation.en: ♪ Achong ma ne chung ♪ ♪ Achong ma ne chung ♪

translation.es: Achong ma ne chung. Achong ma ne chung.

translation.en: -♪ Achong ma ne chung ♪ -[Dia] Oh! ♪ Achong ma ne chung ♪ ♪ Achong ma ne chung ♪
♪ Achong ma ne chung ♪ ♪ Achong ma ne chung ♪
-♪ Achong ma ne chung ♪ -Four, three. ♪ Achong ma ne chung ♪ -Hey! -♪ Achong ma ne chung ♪
translation.es: - Achong ma ne chung. - Cuatro, tres.

translation.en: -[Dia] Well done. That's the one. -Well done, darling.
translation.es: - Muy bien. Esa es. - Muy bien, cariño.

translation.en: It looks like Stevie has a new friend, huh?
translation.es: Parece que Stevie tiene un amigo nuevo.

translation.en: Stevie? Come on, baby. Let's go.
Oh, and by the way, sing a little bit lower next time.
translation.es: Por cierto, canta un poco más bajo la próxima vez.

translation.en: [Ted] We saved you the VIP seat.
VIP? That's a bit fancy, Ted.
-A harmonica? Did you say thank you? -No.
Remember. Don't rush. Take your time.
translation.es: No te apresures. Tómate tu tiempo.
- Toca cuando estés listo. - Sí, Vinnie.

translation.en: [mum] Well done, Ted. Well done, Vince.
translation.es: Muy bien, Ted. Muy bien, Vince.

translation.en: [woman] Mr. Denham. You've been unemployed for a while now.
translation.es: Señor Denham, lleva mucho tiempo sin empleo.

translation.en: And I see you have no musical training at all.
translation.es: Y veo que no tiene ninguna formación musical.

translation.en: No, I just always had an instinct for it.
More of a Lennon than McCartney.
translation.es: Más un Lennon que un McCartney.

translation.en: It might help having other options.
-About Peckham's Finest. -Do you want a drink? Because if not…
translation.es: - Para Lo mejor de Peckham. - ¿Quieres un trago? Si no…

translation.en: No, I do. I do. But I need to show you something first. Check this out.
translation.es: Sí, pero primero te quiero mostrar esto.

translation.en: See that? I've got an online following.
They're all fans and they're all local. Imagine the bar take.
translation.es: Todos son fanes y son locales. Imagínate cómo se llenaría.

translation.en: Next one's in a couple of weeks.
translation.es: Bien, la próxima es en unas semanas.

translation.en: If you can't bring the kid, you can forget about it.
translation.es: Si no puedes traer al chico, olvídalo.

translation.en: No, he'll be there. He'll be there, I promise. All right?
translation.es: No, estará ahí. Estará ahí, lo prometo. ¿Bien?

translation.en: [laughs] Okay, you two, not bad. Not bad.
Listen, we're finished for today. Until next week.
translation.es: Terminamos por hoy. Hasta la próxima semana.

translation.en: -Put your stuff away, okay? Be right back. -All right.
Hey, Stevie, man, can I show you something?
Look, bro. Now check this out, man. Look.
You see? That's me. That's you.
translation.es: ¿Ves? Ese soy yo. Ese eres tú.

translation.en: And it's on its way to, like, 100,000 views or whatever.
translation.es: Y está por llegar a las 100 000 reproducciones o lo que sea.

translation.en: And because of this, I got us a gig at Peckham's Finest.
translation.es: Y, gracias a esto, podemos tocar en Lo mejor de Peckham.

translation.en: If we're gonna do it, we need to practice, man.
We need to rehearse, rehearse, rehearse.
I never had a gig in my entire life.
Yeah, this is your chance, dude.
In front of a real audience.
Look, I was in a band once, you know?
With my experience and your drumming,
translation.es: Con mi experiencia y tu percusión,

translation.en: I don't like big crowds and sudden things.
Don't be scared, man. We can change that. I can help you.
translation.es: No tengas miedo. Podemos cambiar eso. Puedo ayudarte.

translation.en: -Hey, have you got your own drum kit? -Yes, Vince.
Yeah, Mum. Vinnie and I are gonna do a gig.
translation.es: Sí, mamá. Vinnie y yo tocaremos en vivo.

translation.en: -Ignore him. -Wait, wait, wait! Let me show you this.
♪ Lord, won't you take my hand… ♪
Is she one of them hotline babes? What's a hotline babe?
translation.es: - ¿Trabaja en una línea directa sensual? - ¿Qué es eso?

translation.en: Never mind. Look, Stevie. Stevie, I need to level with you, okay?
translation.es: Olvídalo. Mira, Stevie, necesito ser sincero contigo.

translation.en: Dude, what do you want more than anything else in this entire world?
translation.es: ¿Qué es lo que más quieres en el mundo?

translation.en: Maybe I can help you with it. Come on.
I want to go to music school.
Right. Listen, if we do this gig,
translation.es: Sí. Escucha, si tocamos esta vez,

translation.en: it's going to open up some real opportunities for you, man.
I've got some really important people coming down. Do you know Austin Roberts?
translation.es: Irá gente muy importante. ¿Conoces a Austin Roberts?

translation.en: No? All right, well, he's a really big deal.
All right, and if we impress him, Stevie,
we might be able to go on tour.
Imagine me and you on tour together.
[Stevie's mum] Is someone at the door?
Stevie, this is something I've been trying to get back for a long time.
translation.es: He intentado recuperar esto por mucho tiempo.

translation.en: I really need your help with this.
How you doing? It's nice to see ya.
-What are you doing here? -I invited him for a cup of tea.
translation.es: - ¿Qué haces aquí? - Lo invité a tomar té.

translation.en: It's… funny… My… My brother used to do that as well.
translation.es: Es gracioso. Mi hermano hacía eso también.

translation.en: Couldn't wait to get to the jammy bit.
Oh God, I'm… I'm really sorry to hear that.
Yeah? You don't dance anymore, no?
Vince is in a famous band, Mum.
translation.es: Vince está en una banda famosa, mamá.

translation.en: I was but… yeah. Things change.
translation.es: Estaba, pero, sí, las cosas cambian.

translation.en: What famous band was that then?
Do you know, um, Stereo Dream?
Austin Roberts is going to be at the gig when we perform.
There's not going to be a gig, Stevie. Can you please stop mentioning that?
translation.es: No van a tocar. ¿Puedes dejar de mencionar eso?

translation.en: -Well actually what? What are you doing? -I'm only trying…
translation.es: - ¿Bueno, en realidad qué? ¿Qué haces? - Solo intento…

translation.en: No, no, no, you have no idea that you're putting him in a dangerous situation.
translation.es: No sabes que lo pones en una situación peligrosa.

translation.en: Do you understand? I can't have that.
He wants to perform and… he needs an audience. He said it before.
translation.es: Quiere tocar y necesita público. Ya lo dijo.

translation.en: -Stevie, tell her, mate. -He has no idea what that involves.
translation.es: - Stevie, dile. - No tiene idea de lo que implica.

translation.en: Please don't come here and start putting ideas into his head.
translation.es: No vengas a ponerle ideas en la cabeza.

translation.en: Ideas in his… What are you talking about? This is his future.
That's not for you to say.
Other than drumming, do you know anything about his life?
translation.es: Además de la batería, ¿sabes algo de su vida?
¿Algo sobre el autismo? Lo que sea…

translation.en: You know what? Look at this.
I really don't want to see it. I'm not interested.
translation.es: No quiero verlo, no me interesa.

translation.en: [Stevie's mum] I'm not letting you interfere with his life. [Vinnie] Interfere?
translation.es: - No dejaré que interfieras en su vida. - ¿Interferir? Le doy una oportunidad.

translation.en: You know, I'm giving him an opportunity and now you're holding him back.
translation.es: - No dejaré que interfieras en su vida. - ¿Interferir? Le doy una oportunidad. - Tú lo estás reteniendo. - No conoces a Stevie.

translation.en: [Stevie's mum] You don't know Stevie at all.
translation.es: - Tú lo estás reteniendo. - No conoces a Stevie.

translation.en: [Vinnie] If you don't let him follow his dreams, he's going to stay like this.
translation.es: Si no dejas que siga sus sueños, se quedará así.

translation.en: -[Stevie's mum] Stay like what? -[Vinnie] You know what.
[Stevie's mum] I don't. You have all the answers. Go on, like what?
Tea time's over. I think it's time you should go.
translation.es: Se acabó el té, es hora de que te vayas…

translation.en: Oh my God, Stevie. Stevie? Stevie? Stevie? Stevie? Stevie?
Sorry. Sorry, baby. Stevie? Stevie, just take a deep breath. Deep breath.
-Is he okay? -I just need to find his… his sticks.
I'll be back in one second, okay? I'm just gonna go and find them.
translation.es: Volveré en un segundo. Iré a buscarlas.

translation.en: One second. Don't… move or do… Don't do anything.
translation.es: Un segundo. No te muevas ni hagas nada.

translation.en: Stevie, are you all right, mate?
Stevie. Stevie, remember that Dia song?
♪ Achong ma ne chung ♪ ♪ Achong ma ne chung ♪
♪ Achong ma ne chung ♪ ♪ Achong ma ne chung ♪
-[both] ♪ Achong ma ne chung ♪ -[Vinnie] Yes. [both] ♪ Achong ma ne chung ♪ ♪ Achong ma ne chung ♪
♪ Achong ma ne chung ♪ ♪ Achong ma ne chung ♪
That's it. Take your time, man.
translation.es: Eso es. Tómate tu tiempo, viejo.

translation.en: It is, innit? I just need to write some killer lyrics.
translation.es: Sí, ¿no? Solo me falta escribir la letra.

translation.en: And I'm loving those tins, dude.
Yes. I love the sound they make. Yeah. Me too. And it'll make you stand out.
translation.es: - Sí, me encanta el sonido que hacen. - Sí, a mí también. Y te hará destacar.

translation.en: You know, that edge. Like Dave Grohl, Chad Smith.
translation.es: Ya sabes, ese toque, como Dave Grohl, Chad Smith.
toca jazz junto a Keith Jarrett.

translation.en: I also like Bach. But he's not a drummer.
translation.es: También me gusta Bach, pero no es baterista.

translation.en: Just… keep practicing, mate, and you'll be the next Bach before you know it.
translation.es: Sigue practicando y serás el próximo Bach antes de que te des cuenta.

translation.en: Why would I want to be Bach? I'm me.
translation.es: ¿Por qué querría ser Bach? Soy yo.

translation.en: It's not about being you, is it? It's about being someone.
translation.es: No se trata de ser tú. Se trata de ser alguien.

translation.en: Back in the day when I used to walk out on stage,
I wasn't going out there as me. I was someone else.
translation.es: no salía como yo, era otra persona.

translation.en: I wanted to do my own thing anyway, so…
Shall we, uh… work on these lyrics?
Make sure to slap that on the story, fellas.
You know the vibes, engagement, engagement.
translation.es: Ya lo saben, hay que interactuar.

translation.en: Mr. Roberts is ready to see you now.
translation.es: El Sr. Roberts lo verá ahora.

translation.en: You can tell the A&R guys, you can tell the publishers, absolutely not.
translation.es: Puedes decírselo a los de A&R y a la discográfica, absolutamente no.

translation.en: We are not wavering on this at all.
translation.es: No flaquearemos en esto, ni siquiera un uno por ciento,

translation.en: Not even by one percent. You know that, Will.
translation.es: No flaquearemos en esto, ni siquiera un uno por ciento, lo sabes, Will.

translation.en: ♪ See right through me With those eyes of brown ♪
♪ Oh my princess without a crown… ♪
They should be done in a second.
♪ Hear her calling, I'm already there ♪
translation.es: La oigo llamar y ya estoy ahí.

translation.en: ♪ You want anything, just have it all ♪
♪ Think about you when I'm ten feet tall ♪
translation.es: Pensaré en ti cuando mida tres metros.

translation.en: ♪ Never known a love like this before ♪
translation.es: Nunca había conocido un amor como este.

translation.en: I loved it. I loved it. Great sesh, man. Great sesh. Great sesh.
What's happening, bruv? How are you, man? -Hey. Oh, good, yeah.
translation.es: ¿Qué tal, hermano? - ¿Cómo estás? - Hola. Bien, sí.

translation.en: Yeah, just… a song for my daughter. Here, have a seat.
translation.es: Sí, es una canción para mi hija. Siéntate.

translation.en: Listen, I'm deep in rehearsal, so I don't have a huge amount of time.
translation.es: Escucha, estoy ensayando, así que no tengo mucho tiempo.

translation.en: It's cool, I was… just in the area, passing through.
Yeah, just thought I'd come and see you.
You sound tight. Well drilled, man
Yeah. Yeah, yeah, yeah. But listen, how are things with you?
translation.es: Sí, pero, oye, ¿cómo van las cosas contigo?

translation.en: Yeah. On top of the world, man.
translation.es: Sí. En la cima del mundo.

translation.en: Um, just working on a new EP,
translation.es: Estoy trabajando en un EP nuevo,

translation.en: writing some new stuff, and, um… yeah.
I discovered this… brilliant little drummer, actually.
Yeah, and I've got this, uh, gig coming up. It's exciting. It's, uh…
translation.es: Y tengo una presentación, es emocionante…

translation.en: just for the fans to… feel what they're feeling.
translation.es: Es solo para que los fanes sientan lo que sienten.

translation.en: -I like to do that. It's important. -Yeah.
translation.es: - Me gusta hacer eso. Es importante. - Sí.

translation.en: You, uh… got a new project out, innit?
All systems go here then? Getting ready and that?
Yeah, man, you know. You know yourself, you gotta put in the work.
translation.es: - Sí, lo sabes, tienes que esforzarte. - Sí.

translation.en: -Right. -Everything's gotta be on point. Gotta rehearse, rehearse, rehearse.
translation.es: Todo debe ser perfecto. Hay que ensayar mucho.

translation.en: -Dude, I literally say that all the time. -Yeah?
Yeah, I say that to the drummer all the time.
Yeah, you used to say that to the boys back in the day.
translation.es: Sí, les decías eso a los chicos.

translation.en: We used to take our lead off you, man.
That was good times though, man.
Best times of our lives, eh?

translation.es: Bueno, de la mía al menos.

translation.en: Listen, man, it's been really nice catching up.
translation.es: Oye, me gustó mucho ponernos al día.

translation.en: I gotta take a pee before the next rehearsal…
translation.es: Tengo que orinar y seguir ensayando.
- Tengo muchos teloneros… - No, está bien.

translation.en: Then I got a bunch of support acts I gotta talk to.
translation.es: - Tengo muchos teloneros… - No, está bien. - Debo ir… - Sobre los teloneros.

translation.en: I wanted to talk to you about that. I wanted to show you this, just, uh…
translation.es: Quería hablarte sobre eso. Quería mostrarte esto, solo…

translation.en: I just thought maybe you could come down if you got time or whatever.
translation.es: Pensé que podrías ir si tenías tiempo.

translation.en: You know, man, I'll try my best.

translation.es: - ¿Sí? - Sí, bueno, no te prometo nada.

translation.en: -I really gotta take a pee. -No, it's cool, yeah.
translation.es: - Debo ir al baño. - No, está bien.

translation.en: Maybe we should make a new name for it though.
Come on, man. You're a rock star.
It's about attitude and presence, man. Yeah.
translation.es: Se trata de actitud y presencia. Sí.

translation.en: You hear that? They're calling our name, bro.
♪ Seven nights and I never told a soul ♪
translation.es: Siete noches y nunca se lo dije a nadie.

translation.en: ♪ Seven nights but I couldn't let it go… ♪
translation.es: Siete noches, pero no pude olvidarlo.

translation.en: That is a lot of people.
You know, if you change your mind, that's totally fine.
translation.es: Si cambias de opinión, está bien.

translation.en: He's going to be fine, all right? He's gonna smash it.
translation.es: Va a estar bien, ¿sí? Va a arrasar.

translation.en: ♪ And I never told a soul ♪
translation.es: Siete noches y nunca se lo dije a nadie.

translation.en: ♪ Seven nights but I couldn't let it go ♪
translation.es: Siete noches, pero no pude olvidarlo.

translation.en: ♪ Seven nights running isn't long I know ♪
translation.es: Siete noches corriendo no es mucho, lo sé.

translation.en: Thank you. Thank you so much. Thank you.
Hey, we got to be quick.
Come on. We gotta set up now.
Sorry, guys. Excuse me, please. Sorry.
translation.es: Lo siento, chicos, permiso. Lo siento.

translation.en: Now, it's always good to be a bit competitive with the other acts.
translation.es: Siempre es bueno ser competitivo con los demás.

translation.en: Let's hear a massive round for the wonderful Mysie!
translation.es: ¡Démosle un gran aplauso a la maravillosa Mysie!

translation.en: All right, ladies and gentlemen, we have a debut!
translation.es: Bien, damas y caballeros, ¡tenemos un debut!

translation.en: Now, here… here at Peckham's Finest
translation.es: Aquí en Lo mejor de Peckham
nos gusta el talento de base.

translation.en: So from the square, just off Rye Lane,
translation.es: Desde la plaza, cerca de Rye Lane,

translation.en: Just take your time. You go when you're ready.
translation.es: Tómate tu tiempo. Empieza cuando estés listo.

translation.en: ♪ There's a miracle outside my window ♪
translation.es: Hay un milagro afuera de mi ventana,

translation.en: ♪ But the frame set on fire ♪
♪ I'll never forget The way it felt that day ♪
translation.es: Nunca olvidaré lo que sentí ese día.
Te diste la vuelta y te despediste.

translation.en: ♪ When I was young and free ♪
♪ I flew too high, too far for me ♪
translation.es: volé demasiado alto, demasiado lejos para mí.

translation.en: ♪ Forever young and wild were we ♪
♪ No, there's nowhere in the world I'd rather be ♪
translation.es: No, no hay ningún lugar en el mundo donde preferiría estar.

translation.en: ♪ When I was young and free ♪
♪ I flew too high, too far for me ♪
translation.es: volé demasiado alto, demasiado lejos para mí.

translation.en: ♪ Forever young and wild were we ♪
♪ Now there's nowhere in the world I'd rather be ♪
translation.es: No, no hay ningún lugar en el mundo donde preferiría estar.

translation.en: ♪ No, there's nowhere in the world I'd rather be ♪
translation.es: No, no hay ningún lugar en el mundo donde preferiría estar.

translation.en: This next one, you might recognize but, we gave it a little Denham…
translation.es: La siguiente, puede que la reconozcan, pero le hicimos un remix a lo Denham…

translation.en: We gave it a little Tin Men remix.
♪ There is a house in New Orleans ♪
translation.es: Hay una casa en Nueva Orleans.

translation.en: ♪ And God I know I'm one ♪
translation.es: Y Dios sabe que soy uno.

translation.en: ♪ She sewed my new blue jeans ♪
♪ My father was a gambling man ♪
♪ And it's been the ruin Of many a poor boy ♪
translation.es: Y ha sido la ruina de muchos niños pobres.

translation.en: ♪ And God I know I'm one ♪
translation.es: Y Dios sabe que soy uno.

translation.en: -[man] Jesus, they're playing another one? -It's about someone I…
translation.es: - ¿Van a seguir tocando? - Es sobre alguien que…

translation.en: -[man] Is this for real? -[man 3] Be nice!
♪ Last night I had a dream That we were laughing ♪
♪ Morning came And like the river, you departed… ♪
translation.es: Llegó la mañana y, como el río, te fuiste.

translation.en: [man] I paid to watch music, not this shit.
translation.es: - Pagué para ver música, no esta mierda. - Intento escuchar a la banda.

translation.en: [man 5] I'm trying to listen to the band. Shut up!
translation.es: - Pagué para ver música, no esta mierda. - Intento escuchar a la banda. ¡Cállate!

translation.en: [man] I don't give a fuck. I'm trying to talk to my mate.
translation.es: No me importa, intento hablar con mi amigo.

translation.en: ♪ If I could change one thing ♪
-♪ It would be everything… ♪ -[man] It's rubbish.
[man] Shut up. Music? That's not fucking music, mate.
translation.es: Cállate. ¿Música? Eso no es música, amigo.

translation.en: This prick's brought an ironing board.
-[woman] Shut up! -♪ I keep thinking I see you… ♪
The state of them. Look at them.
-What's wrong with you? -Leave him alone, man!
[Stevie's mum] Vince, what are you doing? Stop!
[Stevie's mum] It's okay. Let's get you home. Come on.
What are you doing, man? What are you doing?

translation.es: - Oye. - Estás vetado de por vida.

translation.en: All right, let's get the music back on!
[Austin] Hey, man, let me help you with that.
You know what? Thanks for coming though, yeah.
[Vinnie] Amber, open the door, please. Plea…
-Amber, I'm sorry. Please! Open the door. -What do you think you're doing?
translation.es: - Amber, lo siento. ¡Por favor! - ¿Qué crees que haces?

translation.en: [Vinnie] I'm sorry. I was trying to help him.
translation.es: - Lo siento. Quería ayudarlo. - Necesito que me escuches.

translation.en: [Amber] I need you to listen to me now. I gave you a shot and you fucked it up.
translation.es: - Lo siento. Quería ayudarlo. - Necesito que me escuches. Te di una oportunidad y la cagaste.

translation.en: That's on you. Do you understand that?
-I was trying to protect him! -You weren't.
Getting into a fight isn't protecting him.
-It's time to grow up. -He needs me!
-Vince, nobody needs you. -[woman] Keep it down, please?
translation.es: - Vince, nadie te necesita… - Dejen de gritar.

translation.en: He's got talent. Amber, he's got talent.
Real talent and you want to let him rot away in his room.
translation.es: Talento de verdad y quieres que se pudra en su cuarto.

translation.en: Don't you ever, ever come here again.
And don't you ever try and contact Stevie. I fucking mean it.
translation.es: Y nunca intentes contactar a Stevie. Lo digo en serio.

translation.en: Right. So where do you want to go when you come out? America.
translation.es: - Ya. ¿Adónde quieres ir cuando salgas? - Estados Unidos.

translation.en: [Vinnie] How you gonna pay for that?
Well, I hear you're doing pretty well these days.
translation.es: Supe que te está yendo bien.

translation.en: 'Cause you look like shit, bruv, I bought you something.
translation.es: Como te ves horrible, te compré algo.

translation.en: Thought it might cheer you up.
[mum] I love it when you two play. [Vinnie] Right. Remember this?
translation.es: - Me encanta cuando tocan juntos. - Claro. ¿Recuerdas eso?

translation.en: [mum] Ted, do you want me to…?
[Vinnie] Now, bring it home for me, bro.
How long for? A while. It's a thirty-day tour.
translation.es: - ¿Por cuánto tiempo? - Bastante. Es una gira de 30 días.

translation.en: Maybe. I'll still be back for your birthday though, yeah?
translation.es: Quizá. Pero volveré para tu cumpleaños, ¿sí?

translation.en: -Oh, don't worry about it. -No, bruv, I'll be there. I promise.
translation.es: - No te preocupes. - No, hermano, te prometo que iré.

translation.en: [mum] Oh, that would be lovely, Vinnie.
[mum] Will you definitely be there Friday?
Yeah, Mum, I'll be there. I promise.
[mum] Yeah, we'd really like that. He's… not doing so well.
translation.es: Sí, nos gustaría mucho. No está muy bien.

translation.en: Look, Mum. It's getting kind of crazy here, but I'll see you Friday.
translation.es: Es una locura aquí, pero nos vemos el viernes.

translation.en: All right, yeah, I love you. Bye. Bye.
Guys, guys, guys, I need to let you into a bit of a secret.
Due to popular demand, we've got another ten more dates.
translation.es: Debido a la demanda popular, tenemos diez fechas más.

translation.en: Uh, when does that start, Dennis?
First one is this Friday. Amsterdam.
Um, is there any way we could push that back a bit?
What could be more important than this?
No, it's just that I promised my, uh…
translation.es: No, es que le prometí a mi…

translation.en: I might need a couple of days to…
We might change our minds about you.
translation.es: Podríamos cambiar de opinión sobre ti.

translation.en: Um, yeah. No, of course. Yeah, I'm there. I'm there.
[driver] Ladies and gentlemen, we've arrived at Hastings.
translation.es: Damas y caballeros, llegamos a Hastings.

translation.en: This service terminates here. Thank you.
I'm sorry that I didn't make it down.
You know how it is, innit?
I was thinking about that harmonica Ted used to play, remember?
translation.es: Estaba pensando en la armónica que tocaba Ted, ¿recuerdas?

translation.en: Think it's still up in the loft?
-It's just, I kind of wanted something… -No, I don't know.
translation.es: - Es que quería algo… - No, no sé.

translation.en: Sure you don't know where it is?
-I told you I don't know. -I'll look myself.
Oh, you can't ambush me like this.
I don't know where it is.
Stevie, I'm talking to you. Can you stop that, please?
translation.es: Stevie, te estoy hablando, ¿puedes parar, por favor?

translation.en: Can you talk to me, please? What's wrong?
Okay, I know he was your friend.
translation.es: Bien, sé que era tu amigo.

translation.en: You don't need him to enjoy music, Stevie.
translation.es: No lo necesitas para disfrutar de la música, Stevie.

translation.en: So I can go to the very good music school.
translation.es: Para ir a la escuela de música buena.

translation.en: That's a really big deal, darling. That's a really big deal.
translation.es: Eso es muy grande, cariño. Es muy grande.

translation.en: You know, I think that might be a bit much.
I think that would be a lot for anybody to take on, okay?
translation.es: Creo que eso sería mucho para cualquiera, ¿sí?

translation.en: They wouldn't have the care facilities you need.
translation.es: No tendrían los servicios que necesitas.

translation.en: I don't need them. I want to be like other musicians.
translation.es: No los necesito. Quiero ser como otros músicos.

translation.en: You don't need to be like anyone else.
translation.es: No necesitas ser como los demás.

translation.en: Okay? You're perfect just as you are.
But if I study, you won't have to look after me anymore.
translation.es: Pero si estudio, ya no tendrás que cuidarme.

translation.en: So you could do other things.
I don't understand that. What…? What do you mean?
You stopped dancing so you could look after me.
translation.es: Dejaste de bailar para poder cuidarme.

translation.en: I really need you to hear this, okay?
I didn't want to be part of that world anymore.
translation.es: Ya no quería ser parte de ese mundo.

translation.en: I'm not a child. I don't need you anymore.
translation.es: No soy un niño. Ya no te necesito.

translation.en: Hey, man. What can I get for you? You can get me a manager.
All right, just give me one sec.
I'm gonna have to give you this.
We're looking for some cozy venues to do a gig before we go on tour.
translation.es: Buscamos lugares acogedores para tocar antes de irnos de gira.

translation.en: I think we're probably gonna be a bit too small for you, mate.
All right, have a good night.
I'd like to give you this.
Not much effort in that, is there?
We're, um, looking for some cozy venues to do a gig before we go on tour.
translation.es: Buscamos lugares acogedores para tocar antes de irnos de gira.

translation.en: I don't think this is the venue for you, lad.
translation.es: No creo que este sea el indicado.

translation.en: I recommend you take a look at that.
This is your band, is it?
Yes it is, with my man Vinnie D, called The Tin Men.
translation.es: Sí, con mi amigo Vinnie D, somos Los metaleros.

translation.en: Yeah, like I said, we're not really booking at the minute.
translation.es: No estamos reservando en este momento.

translation.en: You know what? Give me your details and I'll see what I can do.
translation.es: Dame tus datos y veré qué puedo hacer.

translation.en: Slow down, man. What are you talking about?
The place is called Bar Star, and the manager's called Marnie.
translation.es: El lugar se llama Bar Star, la administradora es Marnie.

translation.en: Bro, I'm sorry for what happened.
I'm sorry for your mum as well, but…
translation.es: Lo siento por tu mamá también,

translation.en: She don't want me hanging around you no more, and
translation.es: pero no quiere que nos juntemos.

translation.en: to be honest, I can see why.
If you come to the music group, you can say sorry to her face.
translation.es: Si vienes al grupo de música, puedes pedirle perdón en persona.

translation.en: -Stevie, mate… -Anyway, see you on Thursday. Bye. -No, no, no… -[line clicks]
translation.es: - Stevie, amigo… No… - Nos vemos el jueves. Adiós.

translation.en: Vince, please, just leave us alone, all right?
Why are you lurking around in the car park?
translation.es: ¿Por qué andas merodeando en el estacionamiento?

translation.en: I'm not some kind of sex offender.
I came to say sorry. That's all.
Yeah, he's apologizing. He's not a sex offender.
translation.es: Sí, se disculpa. No es un delincuente sexual.

translation.en: You know he put you in danger. You do get that, right?
translation.es: Sabes que te puso en peligro. Entiendes, ¿no?

translation.en: He didn't mean to do what he did.
translation.es: No quiso hacer lo que hizo.

translation.en: I think you should hear him out.
Both of you, I'm… I'm really sorry.
I made it into a dangerous situation.
translation.es: Lo convertí en una situación peligrosa.

translation.en: Mum, he was trying to protect me.
[Dia in distance] Okay. Okay, we are ready to start.
Come on. I think the class is starting.
translation.es: Vamos. Creo que la clase está empezando.

translation.en: Take a seat. Quick, quick, quick, quick, quick, quick, quick, quick.
Today, we are going to start with some singing.
Who wants to be the heartbeat today?
Vincent, you should be leader today.
translation.es: Vincent, deberías ser el líder hoy.

translation.en: No. Trust me, you don't want me doing that, man.
translation.es: No. Créeme, no quieres que haga eso.

translation.en: Who wants Vincent to be leader?
-Do we want Vincent to be leader? -[all] Yes, Dia.
translation.es: - ¿Queremos que Vincent lo haga? - Sí, Dia.

translation.en: You want me to find the heartbeat?
You can't live without a heartbeat, can you?
translation.es: No puedes vivir sin un latido, ¿verdad?

translation.en: Except this guy. Am I right?
Who's going to sing first then?
I know you've got a beautiful song in there waiting to come out.
translation.es: Sé que tienes una canción hermosa esperando salir.

translation.en: Go on, just… take your time.
I'm going to have to serenade you and we don't want that, do we?
translation.es: tendré que darte una serenata y no queremos eso, ¿o sí?
y la noche oscura y sagrada.

translation.en: She never sang like that for me, you know?
I'm looking for someone to take over for me here.
translation.es: Estoy buscando a alguien que me sustituya.

translation.en: I want to put your name forward.
-Me, teaching? -My brother, when you got it, you got it.
translation.es: - ¿Yo, enseñar? - Hermano, cuando lo tienes, lo tienes.

translation.en: But when you are good, you can help a lot of people.
translation.es: Pero cuando eres bueno, ayudas a mucha gente.

translation.en: The joy that comes from teaching through music
translation.es: La alegría de enseñar a través de la música

translation.en: is better than any money or success.
translation.es: es mejor que el dinero o el éxito.

translation.en: You've been busy. Hopefully we'll hear back from one of these soon.
translation.es: Estuviste ocupado. Espero que nos respondan pronto.

translation.en: I kind of had a… offer as well, actually.
translation.es: También tengo una oferta, de hecho.

translation.en: Do you know anything about music therapy?
I'm sorry about what happened last time.
Ah, don't be silly, man. It's fine.
To be honest, you had a point.
I could've stepped up for you more back when, uh…
Anyway, I just got shown a video
translation.es: En fin, me acaban de mostrar un video

translation.en: of you and your drummer performing at The George.
translation.es: de ti y tu baterista tocando en The George.

translation.en: The sound is really great, man.

translation.es: Gracias, viejo. Básicamente, no prometo nada porque debo hablar con Den,

translation.en: No promises because I gotta run it by Den, but…
translation.es: Básicamente, no prometo nada porque debo hablar con Den,

translation.en: you're in the mix to take the supporting slot on my tour.
Would you be free to come down to the studio on Friday for a chat?
translation.es: ¿Podrías venir al estudio el viernes para conversar?

translation.en: Yeah, let me just, uh, check the old schedule.
I think I can make that.
-All right. Brilliant. -All right. See you then, mate.
Are we playing Bar Star first?
No, man. No, we're going on tour, I want to write something new.
translation.es: No, nos vamos de gira, quiero escribir algo nuevo.

translation.en: You know, a month ago I couldn't even finish off a verse.
translation.es: Hace un mes, ni siquiera podía terminar un verso.

translation.en: Hey, we need to get your mum on our side, though.
All right, I'll speak to her.
No, no, no, no. Dave, you gave me a chance, right?
translation.es: No. Dave, me diste una oportunidad, ¿no?

translation.en: And I blew it. I'm sorry. I apologize.
translation.es: La arruiné, lo siento, me disculpo.

translation.en: Okay, give me 15 seconds and I'll be out of here.
Do you wanna go for a drink with me?
Not here. Not here. Okay, somewhere else. Somewhere nicer.
translation.es: No aquí, en otro lugar, en un lugar mejor.

translation.en: All right. Dave, it's been emotional.
[Vinnie] Everything's so small from up here, innit?
translation.es: Todo es tan pequeño desde aquí, ¿no?

translation.en: Hey. Great to see you again, Vinnie.
translation.es: Hola. Qué bueno verte de nuevo, Vinnie.

translation.en: -When was the last time we…? -Uh, Smash Hits Awards.
translation.es: - ¿Cuándo fue la última vez…? - Los Smash Hits.

translation.en: Fuck me, was it as long as that?
Listen, we want this tour to be huge. Yeah, we need a support act that
translation.es: Escucha, queremos que esta gira sea enorme, necesitamos un telonero

translation.en: has some real meaning to the fans.
translation.es: que tenga un significado para los fanes.

translation.en: I want you to support me on my final tour.
translation.es: Quiero que vayas en mi gira final.

translation.en: Maybe at the end of your set, I could come on stage and join you?
translation.es: ¿Tal vez cuando termines me podría unir a tu presentación?

translation.en: We could do one of the old hits.
translation.es: Tocamos uno de los éxitos antiguos.

translation.en: I kind of need him 'cause we're The Tin Men, innit?
translation.es: Lo necesito, porque somos Los metaleros, ¿no?

translation.en: Yeah, I get it. He's a talent but, um…
translation.es: Sí, lo entiendo. Es un talento, pero…

translation.en: Listen, we all know what happened at that pub.
translation.es: Todos sabemos qué pasó en ese bar.

translation.en: You can't be running that kind of risk, Vince.
translation.es: No puedes correr ese riesgo, Vince.

translation.en: You can't have a special needs kid
translation.es: No puedes tener un chico con necesidades especiales

translation.en: with zero experience going out drumming on the tour.
I think he'd be all right if he had a bit of support.
translation.es: Estaría bien si tuviera un poco de apoyo.

translation.en: [Dennis] All I'm saying is this is about you.
translation.es: Solo digo que se trata de ti.

translation.en: I've got drummers ten times his caliber, you know?
translation.es: Tengo bateristas diez veces mejores que él.

translation.en: Ones that can handle the crowds.
translation.es: Los que pueden manejar la multitud.

translation.en: You're going to be playing these songs to a massive audience.
translation.es: Van a tocar estas canciones para un público masivo.

translation.en: And we all know you've got unfinished business up on that stage.
translation.es: Sabemos que tienes asuntos pendientes en ese escenario.

translation.en: You might even get an album off the back of it.
Don't tell me you don't want that, Vince.
translation.es: No me digas que no quieres eso, Vince.

translation.en: No, of course I do. Of course.
translation.es: Sí, claro que sí. Por supuesto.

translation.en: Stevie. I had a meeting with Austin and his manager Dennis yesterday.
translation.es: Stevie, tuve una reunión con Austin y su representante Dennis ayer.

translation.en: They asked me to do the tour by myself.
translation.es: Quieren que vaya de gira solo.

translation.en: They just weren't up for it.
I think 'cause me and Austin have got a history,
translation.es: Como Austin y yo tenemos historia,

translation.en: that's the only reason they want me to go without you.
translation.es: solo por eso quieren que vaya sin ti.

translation.en: I really thought they were going to take a punt on us, mate. I really did.
translation.es: De verdad creí que confiarían en nosotros.

translation.en: You only get one shot, and that's if you're lucky.
translation.es: Tienes una oportunidad si tienes suerte.

translation.en: It's a very great opportunity for you.
translation.es: Es una gran oportunidad para ti.

translation.en: Yeah but, I don't know if I'm going to do it yet.
translation.es: Sí, pero aún no sé si lo haga.

translation.en: I said to them I'd think about it.
If you have a second shot, then you really have to take it.
translation.es: Si tienes una segunda oportunidad, tienes que tomarla.

translation.en: There will never be a third shot.

translation.es: El mes que viene es mi cumpleaños.

translation.en: That's wicked, man. What are you gonna do?
I'm going to go to a restaurant for something to eat with my mum after the music group.
translation.es: Iré a un restaurante a comer algo con mi mamá después del grupo de música.

translation.en: Yeah, man. Yeah, I'd love that.
You going? I'll see you later, Stevie, yeah?
Okay, my friends. Let's start. Are we ready?
You know, I saw Nadeera's mum today.
translation.es: Hoy vi a la mamá de Nadeera.

translation.en: Everybody misses you at music group, she says.
translation.es: Dice que te extrañan en el grupo de música.

translation.en: You know, I still don't understand why you're not going.
translation.es: Aún no entiendo por qué no vas.

translation.en: Nah… It's not the same anymore.
translation.es: No. Ya no es lo mismo.

translation.en: Sure you don't want me to come with you?
-Definitely don't need your sticks? -No, I'm all right. Thank you.
I can do this on my own.
Just have fun. Have a great day, and I'll see you at home.
translation.es: Diviértete, que tengas un buen día y te veré en casa.

translation.en: Yeah, okay. Just… turn around. Okay. Go.
translation.es: Sí, bueno. Date la vuelta. Bien. Ve.

translation.en: [woman] This is our state-of-the-art percussion department.
translation.es: Este es nuestro departamento de percusión de última generación.

translation.en: [woman] This is our world-class concert hall,
translation.es: Esta es nuestra sala de conciertos de clase mundial,

translation.en: which has played host to some of the finest musicians in the world.
translation.es: que ha acogido a algunos de los mejores músicos del mundo.

translation.en: -Did Jack DeJohnette play here? -[woman] That's correct.
Yeah. You know, he's going to need some time, I think.
Yeah. It was a… a bombshell for both of us.
translation.es: Sí. Fue una bomba para los dos.

translation.en: Oh yeah? Going on tour with Austin Roberts.
translation.es: ¿Sí? Irse de gira con Austin Roberts.

translation.en: I wanted it to be with Stevie.
You must be relieved it's all over now though, hey?
translation.es: Debes estar aliviada de que se acabara.

translation.en: Come on, now. I know you've always hated me.
translation.es: Vamos. Sé que siempre me odiaste.

translation.en: You have managed to bring out something in him
translation.es: Has logrado sacar algo en él

translation.en: that no one else has been able to do.
I saw how much you meant to him.
Why do you think I agreed to the gig?
translation.es: ¿Por qué crees que acepté que tocaran?

translation.en: Because I saw how bloody brilliant The Tin Men were.
translation.es: Porque vi lo genial que eran Los metaleros.

translation.en: You know, these days I look at Stevie
and I see these flashes of the man he could be.
translation.es: y veo, por un segundo, al hombre que podría ser.

translation.en: He was sort of stuck, you know.
But… I can't just stand by
translation.es: Pero no puedo quedarme de brazos cruzados y ver que lo llenen de promesas vanas.

translation.en: and watch his head get filled with empty promises. I can't do that.
translation.es: Pero no puedo quedarme de brazos cruzados y ver que lo llenen de promesas vanas. No puedo.

translation.en: He was never in it to make a name for himself, Vince.
translation.es: Nunca lo hizo para hacerse conocido, Vince.

translation.en: All he ever wanted was a friend.
Should have been both of us.
It's Vince Denham on tour and…
translation.es: Es Vince Denham de gira y…

translation.en: -[Amber] Don't say that. -No, I shouldn't do it.
translation.es: - No digas eso. - No debería hacerlo.

translation.en: [Amber] Vince, you've wanted this for so long.
translation.es: Vince, hace mucho que lo quieres.

translation.en: But I need you out of his life.
translation.es: Pero debes salir de su vida.

translation.en: What about his birthday? He asked me if I…
I hope this goes well for you. I really do.
translation.es: Espero que te vaya bien. De verdad.

translation.en: But I've got to draw the line here.
You understand what I'm saying, don't you?
He needs to find his own path now.
translation.es: Debe encontrar su propio camino ahora.

translation.en: Vinnie, I'll introduce you to Jay and Ryan.
translation.es: Vinnie, te presentaré a Jay y Ryan.

translation.en: Jay's, uh, producing, and they've been playing around with your tracks
translation.es: Jay está produciendo, y han estado jugando con tus canciones

translation.en: and coming up with some good ideas.
I think, you know, making it a little bit more, uh, palatable,
translation.es: Creo que las hacen un poco más… aceptables…

translation.en: and we ripped the track from a couple of the clips you sent over.
translation.es: y tomamos la pista de un par de videos que enviaste.

translation.en: -So it sounds a bit rough. -Yeah, he'll get it. Just play it.
translation.es: - Suena poco refinado. - Sí, lo entenderá. Solo ponla.

translation.en: It's a bit more current, yeah? Yeah.
translation.es: Es un poco más actual, ¿sí? Sí.

translation.en: ♪ There's a miracle outside my window… ♪
translation.es: Hay un milagro afuera de mi ventana.

translation.en: Do you reckon we could, uh, dial back the reverb a little bit?
Kind of sounds like I'm in a cathedral or something.
translation.es: Parece que estoy en una catedral o algo así.

translation.en: Yeah, I mean, we can talk about all this, but this is the right sound.
translation.es: Sí, podemos hablar de todo esto, pero este es el sonido correcto.

translation.en: This is really good, yeah? Okay.
Guys, uh, I just need to be with Vinnie, uh, for a few moments.
translation.es: Chicos, necesito hablar a solas con Vinnie uno segundos.

translation.en: If you could just, uh, leave us, that would be great.
Just gonna leave this with you.
You want me to sign this now?
It's… standard terms. You take your time.
translation.es: Son términos estándar. Tómate tu tiempo.

translation.en: When you've signed it just come and join me and Austin out there, yeah?
translation.es: Cuando lo firmes, ven conmigo y Austin.

translation.en: We might change our minds about you.
translation.es: Podríamos cambiar de opinión sobre ti.

translation.en: Go on. Let me see it one more time.
Maybe we should frame it. Mm.
Well, I'm bloody proud of you, whether you get in or not.
translation.es: Estoy muy orgullosa de ti, entres o no.

translation.en: Come on then. Don't be shy.
[Amber] Um, hi? What the hell is going on?
Um, I just wanted to do this just to…
What I'm trying to say is, I think you're banging, man.
translation.es: Lo que trato de decir es que eres genial.

translation.en: Proper. Not in a weird way, but, like…
translation.es: De verdad. No de una manera extraña, sino…

translation.en: ♪ When the sun set on me ♪
translation.es: Cuando el sol se puso sobre mí

translation.en: ♪ I'm not too proud to admit ♪
translation.es: No estoy muy orgulloso de admitirlo.

translation.en: Hey, come on Stevie! We got an empty seat up here, bruv!
translation.es: ¡Vamos, Stevie! ¡Tenemos un asiento vacío aquí arriba!

translation.en: ♪ Feel the change I feel the change ♪
